attributes.additional_details:
Given that the business case for HS2 has been totally discredited, I ask that the government rescinds its decision to proceed with HS2, making the reversal decision public immediately.
as we have not been asked if we would like to have a railway on our doorstep, also it is only beneficial to a few people, and why waste money on something that already works fine, when the the country is suppose to be in defisit
